response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to revolutionize your operations and significantly enhance your business efficiency. Given its high-quality features and unparalleled performance, we believe it is worth more than its face value. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for a price of $15,000. This is an opportunity to secure a game-changing tool at a competitive advantage. I look forward to discussing how this product can transform your business. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 15000}
